sort_title: STAR TREK II - THE WRATH OF KHAN

title: STAR TREK III - THE SEARCH FOR SPOCK
film_summary: Leonard Nimoy's 1984 Star Trek installment, Star Trek III - The Search For Spock, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, James Doohan, Walter Koenig, Nichelle Nichols, George Takei.
poster_notes: This fantatic 2024 anniversary artwork by the one and only Matt Fergerson is stunning, and is printed on thick high-gloss paper.
sort_title: STAR TREK III - THE SEARCH FOR SPOCK

title: STAR TREK VI - THE UNDISCOVERED COUNTRY
film_summary: Nicholas Meyer's 1991, Oscar noninated and highly entertaining 'who-done-it' original cast finale, Star Trek VI - The Undiscovered Country, starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, James Doohan, Walter Koenig, Nichelle Nichols, George Takei, Kim Cattrall and the brilliant Christopher Plummer.
poster_notes: This beautiful artwork has to be my favourite of the six original Star Trek films. This poster has a few random white cracks and some edge wear. It also features a rare '2 Oscar Nominations' sticker.
sort_title: STAR TREK VI - THE UNDISCOVERED COUNTRY

title: STAR TREK - THE FUTURE BEGINS
film_summary: J.J. Abrams' emotional and incredibly well crafted 2009 revamp of Star Trek, Starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Zoe Saldana, Karl Urban, Simon Pegg, Anton Yelchin, John Cho and Eric Banner.

title: STAR WARS EPISODE ONE - THE PHANTOM MENACE
film_summary: George Lucas' highly anticipated 1999 Star Wars prequel, Star wars Episode One - The Phantom Menace, starring Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Nathalie Portman, Jake Lloyd, Ian McDiarmid, Ahmed Best, Anthony Daniles, Kenny Baker, Frank Oz, Ray Park and Samuel L. Jackson.
poster_notes: This is a stunning film quad poster design by the soon to be legendary Matt Fergerson.
sort_title: STAR WARS EPISODE ONE - THE PHANTOM MENACE

title: STAR WARS EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH
film_summary: George Lucas' highly anticipated 2005 final installment of his prequel trilogy Star wars Episode III - Revenge of the Sith, starring Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Hayden Christensen, Ian McDiarmid, Samuel L Jackson, Jimmy Smits, Frank Oz, Anthony Daniels, Christopher Lee, Kenny Baker and Peter Mayhew.
poster_notes: This highly sought after re-release poster by Matt Fergerson is absolutely stunning, having incerdible detail.
sort_title: STAR WARS EPISODE III - REVENGE OF THE SITH

title: STAR WARS TRILOGY
film_summary: George Lucas' 1997 Special Edition Trilogy release, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Wiliams, Dave Prowse, Anthony Daniels, Kenny Baker, Peter Mayhew and Alec Guinness.

title: STAR WARS TRILOGY
film_summary: George Lucas' 1997 trilogy re-release, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Wiliams, Dave Prowse, Anthony Daniels, Kenny Baker, Peter Mayhew and Alec Guinness.
poster_notes: This poster has some creasing and fold lines in the top right corner.

title: STAR WARS - THE EMPIRE STRIKES BACK
film_summary: George Lucas' 1997 re-release of The Empire Strikes Back, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Wiliams, Dave Prowse, Anthony Daniels, Kenny Baker, Peter Mayhew and Alec Guinness.
poster_notes: This poster has some heavy edge wear and creasing, particularly in the top right corner
sort_title: STAR WARS - THE EMPIRE STRIKES BACK

title: STAR WARS - RETURN OF THE JEDI
film_summary: George Lucas' 1983 blockbuster Return Of The Jedi -  The final installment of the Original Star wars Trilogy, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Wiliams, Dave Prowse, Anthony Daniels, Kenny Baker, Peter Mayhew and Alec Guinness.
poster_notes: This extremely rare poster was in near mint, folded condition and has since been linen backed. A superb teaser poster that is arguably better than the subsequent release posters.
sort_title: STAR WARS - RETURN OF THE JEDI

title: STAR WARS - RETURN OF THE JEDI
film_summary: George Lucas' 1997 special edition re-release of Return of the Jedi, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Wiliams, Dave Prowse, Anthony Daniels, Kenny Baker, Peter Mayhew and Alec Guinness.
poster_notes: This film poster has some very minor edge wear.
sort_title: STAR WARS - RETURN OF THE JEDI

title: STAR WARS - RETURN OF THE JEDI
film_summary: George Lucas' 1997 special edition re-release of Return of the Jedi, starring Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Wiliams, Dave Prowse, Anthony Daniels, Kenny Baker, Peter Mayhew and Alec Guinness.
poster_notes: This poster has some minor edge wear.
sort_title: STAR WARS - RETURN OF THE JEDI

title: THE STORY OF ROBIN HOOD
film_summary: 1972 re-release cinema quad poster for Ken Annakin's 1952 Disney adventure The Story Of Robin Hood, starring Richard Todd, Joan Rice and Peter Finch.
poster_notes: This incredible film poster art by Arnaldo Putzuis is the same age as myself and was printed by Sales & Display Services.

title: STRAW DOGS
film_summary: Sam Peckinpah's controversial 1971 crime thriller Straw Dogs, starring Dustin Hoffman, Susan George and Peter Vaughan.
poster_notes: This rare 70's classic has a two inch squared piece missing from the top right corner, a 10 inch tear from the centre of the right edge across to the right vertical fold line (taped from the back), multiple tears, nicks and creasing around the edges and three to five inch tears on many of the fold the lines (all taped from the back) and very slight browning around the edges - perfect for linen backing restoration.

title: THE SUBSTANCE
film_summary: Coralie Fargeat's magnificently excessive 2024 body horror instant classic The Substance, starring Demi Moore, Margaret Qualley and Dennis Quaid.
poster_notes: Coralie and I once worked together in Paris back in 2000, so I am thrilled by her success with this film (she was nominated for best director at the Oscars). As such this brilliantly original and hard to find quad poster design is highly sought after.

title: THE SUGARLAND EXPRESS
film_summary: Steven Spielberg's 1974 underrated second feature Sugarland Express, starring Goldie Horn, Ben Johnson and Michael Sacks.
poster_notes: This rare film poster has the cinema ID stamp from the back just visible (between the two main text areas) from the front.

title: SUNSHINE
film_summary: Danny Boyle's 2007 cult classic sci-fi thriller Sunshine, starring Paloma Baeza, Rose Byrne, Chipo Chung, Cliff Curtis, Chris Evans, Troy Garity and Cillian Murphy.
poster_notes: This is a fantastic and popular poster design.

title: SUPERMAN
film_summary: Richard Donner's 1978 blockbuster, superhero spectacle Superman - The Movie, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Terence Stamp.

title: SUPERMAN
film_summary: Richard Donner's 1978 blockbuster Superman - The Movie, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Terence Stamp.
poster_notes: This film poster has a small 0.5mm tear on the right center fold.

title: SUPERMAN
film_summary: 2023 re-release of Richard Donner's 1978 classic Superman - The Movie, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Terence Stamp.
poster_notes: This modern dynamic artwork produced for the rerelease of this classic film, to celebrate warner Brother's 100th anniversary, has a row of white kink marks running across the lower half of the poster

title: SUPERMAN II
film_summary: Richard Donner's 1980 sequel Superman II, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Margot Kidder and Terence Stamp.
poster_notes: This is the rarer black version.

title: SWEENEY TODD: THE DEMON BARBER OF FLEET STREET
film_summary: Tim Burton's brilliant 2007 gothic musical horror Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber Of Fleet Street, starring Johnny Depp, Helena Bonham Carter, Alan Rickman, Timothy Spall and Sacha Baron Cohen.
sort_title: SWEENEY TODD: THE DEMON BARBER OF FLEET STREET

title: THE TALENTED MR RIPLEY
film_summary: Anthony Minghella's oscar nominated 1999 thriller The Telented Mr. Ripley, starring Matt Damon, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jude Law, Cate Blanchett and Philip Seymour Hoffman.
poster_notes: This beautiful teaser poster has some minor edge wear and a few white specks.

title: TAXI DRIVER
film_summary: Martin Scorsese's highly acclaimed 1976 cult classic Taxi Driver, starring Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Harvey Keitel and Cybill Shepherd.
poster_notes: This classic poster has been trimmed to approximately 28 x 39 inches.

title: TELL NO ONE
film_summary: Guillaume Canet's brilliant 2006 thriller Tell No One ( Ne le dis à personne), starring François Cluzet, Marie-Josée Croze, André Dussollier and Kristin Scott Thomas.
poster_notes: This rare poster is increasingly sought after, partly due to its striking, dynamic design
sort_title: TELL NO ONE (Ne le dis à personne)

title: THE TERMINATOR
film_summary: James Cameron's 1984 sci-fi thriller The Terminator, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael Biehn, Linda Hamilton and Lance Henriksen.
poster_notes: This exceptionally rare, limited re-release film poster is easily the best ever quad poster for this title.

title: THE TEXAS CHAINSAW MASSACRE
film_summary: Tobe Hooper's classic 1974 horror The Texas Chainsaw Massacre starring Marilyn Burns, Allen Danziger, Paul A. Partain, William Vail, Teri McMinn and Gunnar Hansen.
poster_notes: This exceptionally rare re-release poster has one horizontal fold line hidden in the lower black frame where it was folded back to be used in a cinema other than Shaftesbury Avenue (most of these were sadly trimmed).

title: TITANIC
film_summary: James Cameron's 1997 record breaking disaster movie Titanic, starring Kate Winslet and Leonardo De Caprio.
poster_notes: This high gloss film poster is in near mint, rolled.

title: THE TREE OF WOODEN CLOGS
film_summary: Ermanno Olmi's 1978 Palme d'Or winning Italian masterpiece The Tree Of Wooden Clogs, starring Luigi Ornaghi, Francesca Moriggi and Omar Brignoli.
poster_notes: This beautifully designed re-release artwork is a real gem. It is printed on modern heavy paper stock that has a synthetic seal over the print, making it a very robust and durable poster.

title: TROLL HUNTER
film_summary: André Øvredal's imaginative documentary style action fantasy Troll Hunter, starring Otto Jespersen, Glenn Erland Tosterud, Johanna Mørck and Tomas Alf Larsen.
poster_notes: This fantastic film poster is arguable one of the best of 2011. This limited printed version has a 'Star Wars' like logo that was changed soon after release.

title: TRON
film_summary: Steven Lisberger's ground-breaking computer genertaed adventure blockbuster Tron, starring Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner and David Warner.
poster_notes: Fantastic artwork by  Brian Bysouth, makes this a highlky sought after quad poster, especially in rolled. This original has just one small speck of surface paper loss in the top left corner, which can be easily restored if linen backed.

title: TRUE ROMANCE
film_summary: Tony Scott's 1993 take on the Quentin Tarrantino's original crime-romance screenplay True Romance, starring Christian Slater, Patricia Arquette, Dennis Hopper, Val Kilmer, Gary Oldman, Brad Pitt, Christopher Walken and Samuel L. Jackson.
poster_notes: This brilliant, refreshing new movie poster design by distributor's Park Circus was a limited re-release, making these exteremly rare.

title: TWELVE MONKEYS
film_summary: Terry Gilliam's 1995 futuristic thriller Twelve Monkeys, starring Bruce Willis, Brad Pitt and Madeleine Stowe.
poster_notes: This sought after cult film poster classic has staple holes in the corners and middle edges.

title: UNFORGIVEN
film_summary: Clint Eastwood's Oscar-winning 1992 western swan-song masterpiece Unforgiven, starring Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Morgan Freeman and Richard Harris.
poster_notes: This beautifully simple and unpretentious film poster design is highly underrated.

title: UP
film_summary: Pete Docter and Bob Peterson's beautiful and highly original 2009 comedy adventure animation Up, starring Edward Asner, Jordan Nagai and John Ratzenberger.
poster_notes: Arguably one of Pixar's best animation films to date.

title: VAMP
film_summary: Richard Wenk's 1986 cult classic horror VAMP, starring Chris Makepeace, Sandy Baron, Robert Rusler and of course Grace Jones.
poster_notes: This had a limited release in the UK, so was printed in small numbers, making it an exceptionally rare item and highly desirable for any serious 80's horror poster collector. This version has minor edge wear, light veining and a three inch tear on the left edge.

title: THE WATCHMEN
film_summary: Zack Snyder's long awaited 2009 comic book adaptation of The Watchmen starring Malin Akerman, Billy Crudup, Matthew Goode, Jackie Earle Haley, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Patrick Wilson, Carla Gugino, Matt Frewer and Stephen McHattie.

title: WATERSHIP DOWN
film_summary: Martin Rosen's beautiful and heart breaking 1978 animation Watership Down, starring John Hurt, Richard Briers, Malcolm Graham Cox, Ralph Richardson, Roy Kinnear and Denholm Elliott.

title: THE WICKER MAN
film_summary: 2013 final cut re-release of Robin Hardy's 1973 cult classic horror The Wicker Man, starring Edward Woodward, Christopher Lee and Diane Cilento.
poster_notes: This rare limited re-release film poster with it's unique artwork is a real collectors piece.

title: WILLOW
film_summary: George Lucas and Ron Howard's 1988 fantasy adventure Willow, screened in glorious 70mm, starring Val Kilmer, Joanne Whalley, Warwick Davis and Jean Marsh.
poster_notes: This unique film poster was printed for an exclusive one-month screening run at the famous Prince Charles Cinema in London. The artwork was upscaled from a smaller master and appears soft when close-up. Despite this, it is a unique poster for any Willow movie collector.

title: THE WITCHES
film_summary: Nicolas Roeg's wonderful 1990 adaptation of Roald Dahl's classic book The Witches, starring Anjelica Huston, Jane Horrocks and Rowan Atkinson.
poster_notes: Unusual for its time, this fantastic, sumptuously colourful 90's film poster still uses traditional artwork for the majority of its design. This poster has a single sallotaped two inch tear on the right edge.

title: WITHNAIL & I
film_summary: 1997 re-release of Bruce Robinson's 1987 cult classic Withnail & I, starring Richard E. Grant, Paul McGann and Richard Griffiths.
poster_notes: This increasingly popular movie poster is a perfect alternative to the much rarer and over-priced original.

title: WITNESS
film_summary: British 30 x 40 style B cinema quad poster for Peter Weir's oscar winning 1985 drama Witness, featuring arguable one of Harrison Ford's best performances as detective John Book. Also starring Kelly McGillis, Lukas Haas, Danny Glover and Viggo Mortensen.
poster_notes: This classic poster has pin holes in the corners.

title: THE WIZARD OF OZ / TOM THUMB
film_summary: 1964 double-bill re-release poster for Victor Fleming's 1939 technicolor classic The Wizard Of Oz (starring Judy Garland, Frank Morgan, Ray Bolger, Bert Lahr, Jack Haley, Billie Burke and Margaret Hamilton) and George Pal's 1958 film Tom Thumb (starring Russ Tamblyn and Peter Sellers).

title: THE WORLD'S END
film_summary: The World's End is Edgar Wright's final instalment of his Cornetto Trilogy, starring Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Martin Freeman, Paddy Considine, Eddie Marsan and Pierce Brosnan.
